item.title: Silver tops $80 for first time, then stages dramatic reversal overnight
item.description: Silver slid more than 8% on Monday, after topping $80 for the first time ever in overnight trading.

item.title: China to crack down on AI chatbots around suicide, gambling
item.description: The proposed rules come as Chinese artificial intelligence chatbot startups Minimax and Z.ai have this month filed for Hong Kong IPOs.
